title: GENIUS: An Agentic AI Framework for Autonomous Design and Execution of Simulation Protocols
summary: Predictive atomistic simulations have propelled materials discovery, yet routine setup and debugging still demand computer specialists. This know-how gap limits Integrated Computational Materials Engineering (ICME), where state-of-the-art codes exist but remain cumbersome for non-experts.
